hero.title: Hey, I'm Luis Antunes!
hero.subtitle: Full Stack Developer
hero.content: Hi! I'm a passionate tech enthusiast and Computer Science student in my 4th semester at the Federal University of Santa Maria (UFSM), Brazil. I love building web applications and exploring new technologies to create impactful solutions.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Explore some of my recent projects

projects.title: Modular Landing Pages
projects.introduction: A modular system for creating dynamic landing pages
projects.description: Modular Landing Pages is a project designed to simplify the creation of customizable landing pages. Built with React and Strapi, it offers a modular approach that allows users to manage content dynamically through Strapi's CMS. The system ensures flexibility and scalability, making it easy to create and update landing pages with reusable components.

projects.title: Student Enrollment Portal
projects.description: The Student Enrollment Portal is a robust API built with Node.js and Express.js, designed to manage student data efficiently. It features full CRUD operations, user authentication with JWT, profile photo uploads, and input validation. The backend uses MariaDB with Sequelize ORM for data persistence, and bcryptjs for secure password hashing. The API includes endpoints for student management, user administration, photo uploads, and authentication.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: I'm Luis Antunes, a student passionate about web development

whoIAm.title: Who I Am
whoIAm.apresentation: I'm currently a Computer Science student at the Federal University of Santa Maria (UFSM), located in Santa Maria, Brazil. I'm 20 years old and started programming at the end of high school in 2022. Since entering university, I've been intensively developing my skills and discovered web development, which has become one of my main focuses of study. I love building websites, developing APIs, and learning more about interfaces and UI/UX design. I'm also passionate about improving my knowledge of computer science, studying operating systems, and diving into data structures and algorithms (DSA).
